name: Blade of Titan
description:
War, suffer, and grief?! Look what the gods come with them!!
What is the real meaning of power?

Here comes Gods Wars, an RPG with 10 million+ downloads worldwide!

Features:
Rich gameplay: quests, collectables, equipment, alchemy, enhancing, dragonsoul, divine skills, etc.
Gallery: collect all sets to activate exclusive attributes.
Legendary outfits: nearly a hundred sets for you to mix and match. Design your own equipment now!
Perfect combat experience: greatly improved combat system that ensures best experience in limitless combo strikes.
Diverse mobs and bosses: powerful Demon King, cute Gazer, beautiful saber, so on and so forth. You will definitely find your favorite.
Numerous stages: 40 chapters with 200 main stages and countless quests await you!
